<hr>

**50% recurring discount** on all Seattle <font color=#0061bf>1GB+</font> NVMe SSD Premium KVM VPSs! Use coupon **bf2020-50** at checkout

**55% recurring discount** on all Seattle <font color=#0061bf>1GB+</font> NVMe SSD E5 KVM VPSs! Use coupon **bf2020-55** at checkout

**20% recurring discount** on all Seattle <font color=#0061bf>256mb/512mb</font> KVM VPSs! Use coupon **bf2020-20** at checkout

Additional **5% recurring discount** if paid quarterly, **10%** if semi-annually **20%** if paid annually

Discounts valid until end of **Monday 30th November 2020 GMT**

<hr>

Spartan Host is a dedicated server, VPS and colocation provider with the majority of its hosting operations based in Seattle, Washington and Dallas, Texas. We began hosting Minecraft Servers in 2013 but have grown exponentially since building up a reputation of being reliable and dedicated to making the customer's experience the best it can be.

**Features**

- Top class facilities
- Virtualizor Control Panel
- RAID protected NVMe SSD and HDD storage
- KVM Virtualisation
- /64 IPv6 included
- Custom ISOs
- Instant Setup


<br>**Network Test Information**

<br>Location: **Seattle, Washington**

Looking glass: http://lg.sea.spartanhost.net
Data centre information: https://spartanhost.org/dc-seattle

Carriers: Telia, Cogent, NTT, China Mobile and China Telecom
Peering: Telus and many others via the Seattle Internet Exchange

<br>**DDoS Protection**

<br>Seattle: **20Gb/s TCP - burst up to 40Gb/s**, upgrade to **200Gb/s** available for $4 per month at checkout - provided by CNServers

<p>All OS options can be seen at checkout, custom ISOs can be uploaded within Virtualizor without the need to contact us. Additional IPv4 addresses are $2 per month.</p>

<p>All VPS services are unmanaged.</p>

<p>Terms of service: http://spartanhost.org/tos</p>

BGP sessions available at a small one off setup cost of $15. Full route tables available in Seattle.

<p>If you have any questions or would like a custom quote, don't hesitate to email us at: <a href="mailto:sales@spartanhost.net">sales@spartanhost.net</a>, call us on <b>02895 813535</b> if in the UK or <b>602 9105858</b> if in the US or add us on Skype: <b>spartan_host</b></p>
